featuredArticle.title: Ski the Alps
featuredArticle.description: The Alps are the ideal location for a first ski trip. It is a safe place to travel and the locals are quite friendly and happy to see other skiiers.

articles.title: Surf camps in Costa Rica
articles.description: Costa Rica is the ideal location for a first surf trip. It is a safe place to travel and the locals are quite friendly and happy to see other surfers.

articles.title: Oktoberfest!
articles.description: Visit Germany to get your fill of beer, sausage and revel in the festivities of Oktoberfest.

articles.title: Colorado Rock Climbing
articles.description: Colorado is the ideal location to learn rock climbing. Endless adventures in beautiful scenery.

articles.title: Adventure Mountain Biking
articles.description: Come join enthusiastic mountain bikers in the beautiful hills of Northern California.

articles.title: Wine Tour in Italy
articles.description: If you want the best wine tasting in an idilac setting, Italy is the place to be.
